column1: '''Dailir''' was the name of the arrow used by [[Beleg|Beleg Strongbow]] with his bow
column2: [[Belthronding]].  After shooting this arrow Beleg always found it unharmed.  However
column3: it was broken at last when Beleg fell upon it when he was carrying [[TÃºrin]].<ref>{{LB|1c}}</ref>

column1: ''dailir'' is glossed "cleaver" in the Noldorin Word-lists
column2: and is related to the [[Noldorin]] verb ''daila-'' "to cleave" and the noun ''dail'' "axe-blade". The ''-ir'' suffix creates an "agent noun" (such as adding 'r' to 'bite' in English produces 'biter').<ref>{{PE|13}} p. 141</ref><ref>{{HH|Death}}
